newsitem.title: FINLAND: Finnish Nov M2 shrinks 1.2 pct yr/yr -Cen Bank.
newsitem.headline: Finnish Nov M2 shrinks 1.2 pct yr/yr -Cen Bank.

text.p: Finland's M2 money aggregate shrank 1.2 percent year-on-year in November after expanding 0.3 percent in October, the Bank of Finland said on Wednesday SPFG.
NOTE: M1 comprises currency in circulation, and cheques, giro and transaction accounts. M2 comprises M1 and fixed-term and other bank deposits held by the public.
M3 comprises M2 plus outstanding bank certificates of deposits held by the public.
The Bank of Finland has not published targets for the money aggregates, but it has said they are among the economic indicators it monitors to quide monetary policy.
